feedSignal.name: feedSignal
feedSignal.description: Attach feed signals, like UpDownVote, UserVerified, and Verified, to a feed post or comment.

FeedEntityId.description: The ID of the Feed entity.

FeedItemId.description: The ID of the feed post or comment.

InsertedById.description: ID of user who inserted the signal.

SignalValue.description: The value of the signal. For example, for UpDownVote, the value specifies whether the signal is an upvote or a downvote.
